title: How to Get the Choreographer Job in BitLife: Easy Step-by-Step Guide

steps.title: Start a new life.
steps.content: Start a new life. You can have any stats when you start out, so you don't need to aim for a specific Smarts or Looks stat. You can also start in just about any country.

steps.title: Age up until you graduate high school.
steps.content: Age up until you graduate high school. If you want to participate in extracurricular activities you can, but it's not required to get a job as a Choreographer one day.

steps.title: Get a Dance degree in university.
steps.content: Get a Dance degree in university. After graduating high school, select the option to go to university. If you don't see Dance as an option in the major dropdown, age up one year and try again. [1] X Research source Keep aging up until you find Dance as an option for a major.

steps.title: Complete your Dance degree.
steps.content: Complete your Dance degree. Once again, you don't have to join any clubs or have a particular part-time job while you're in university to get a choreographer job.

steps.title: Apply for a Jr.
steps.content: Apply for a Jr. Choreographer job. After graduating university, go to the jobs menu (tap the Job button on the main screen, then select Jobs ) and apply for a Jr. Choreographer position. You'll have to pass a simple interview to get the job. If you don't see a Jr. Choreographer job, you can do one of three things: Restart the app. This can refresh the list of jobs without causing you to age up. Age up one year until you find the Jr. Choreographer position. Take a job as a dance instructor until you find a Jr. Choreographer job.

steps.title: Do well at your Jr.
steps.content: Do well at your Jr. Choreographer job. You can put in extra effort by going to Job > Jr. Choreographer > Work Harder . This will increase your job performance, which is what will eventually lead to you getting a promotion.

steps.title: Age up until you get promoted.
steps.content: Age up until you get promoted. Make sure to tap the Work Harder button in your Jr. Choreographer menu at least once a year to keep your job performance on a positive incline. After a few years, you will get promoted to Choreographer.
